products.notes: A refreshing and tart fruit sour with rhubarb, strawberry and vanilla
products.name: Rave

products.notes: This pina colada inspired IPA is bursting with coconut, pine and tropical fruit
products.name: Tropical Thunder

products.notes: Wonderfully soft and palatable bitter with a sweet and dry hop character
products.name: Holy Island Bitter

products.notes: Refreshing golden ale with a touch of honeyed sweetness
products.name: Spring Blonde

products.notes: A ruby mild brewed for May using Simpsons double roasted crystal malt combined with Bramling Cross Hops
products.name: Fast Fashion

products.notes: A dark beer with a smooth body and a little bite from the hops, made to the Baltic porter style
products.name: Torpor

products.notes: Full-bodied and sweet with smooth roast, hints of treacle, coffee and chocolate flavours
products.name: Dark Mild

products.notes: This classic blonde ale is light, with sweet malt and subtle citrus flavours on the finish.
products.name: Ixworth Blonde GF

products.notes: Simcoe single hop pale ale with refreshing grapefruit and passionfruit
products.name: Paradigm

products.notes: An easy drinking pale packed with a tropical blend of US hops. Expect zesty citrus and smooth tropical fruit, with a resinous West coast edge and smooth bitterness
products.name: Quantum State

products.notes: An easy drinking pale packed with a tropical blend of US hops. Expect zesty citrus and smooth tropical fruit, with a resinous West coast edge and smooth bitterness
products.name: Quantum State

products.notes: A russet coloured best bitter.
products.name: B.O.B.

products.notes: Hoppy golden ale
products.name: Eastern Gold

products.notes: Starts with warm fruity malts, finishing with a hoppy bitterness
products.name: Magnificent Men

products.notes: Rich malty red bitter with toffee notes. Brewed for local malt barley grower, Branthill Farm
products.name: Stirling

products.notes: Red ale with rich malty flavours
products.name: Red of Heaven

products.notes: Chestnut-coloured, full-bodied bitter with a rich malty base
products.name: Rocketeer

products.notes: A traditional stout with an aroma of dark autumnal berries and is full bodied with undertones of dark chocolate and roasted malts and a gentle, lingering finish.
products.name: Spiral Stout

products.notes: This honey IPA is a festival special for 2024.
products.name: Honey I Drank the Kids

products.notes: A refreshing and fruity summer ale loaded with Galaxy hops.
products.name: Sundance

products.notes: A modern blonde ale with big traditional flavours, it features a blend of four hops and two malts, giving a citrus aroma with a grapefruit finish.
products.name: Blonde GF

products.notes: This crisp blonde ale has sweet citrus aromas, infused with real mexican Tequila and lime, with hints of grapefruit, finishing with bitter notes.
products.name: Tequila Blonde

products.notes: This rye IPA is rich and buttery, with sweetness from red berries. A great find for the connoisseur
products.name: 6 Degrees of Separation

products.notes: Traditional bitter, with notes of caramel and hedgerow fruit
products.name: Hurricane

products.notes: Brewed in the style of a traditional English stout, the oats bring softness and a subtly roasted flavour.
products.name: Oatmeal Stout

products.notes: A truly pale blonde in colour, this beer is heavily hopped to give a really refreshing citrus-hop kick. Pineapple, Peach & Grapefruit hop flavours abound in levels that are such that you don't need to read the tasting notes to spot them...
products.name: Polar Star

products.notes: Expect melon, citrus and pine from this trial hop, CF184.
products.name: Single Hop 'Princess'

products.notes: A deep red ale brewed in the style of a traditional German Dunkel, using malt solely from Munich and hops found in Hereford and Kent. Subtle notes of toffee and malt envelop the taste profile.
products.name: The Eyes of Moddey Dhoo

products.notes: A remake of an original India pale ale from the 1880s, it's pale and packed full of hops.
products.name: Origins IPA

products.notes: Gold-coloured with a grassy aroma from Fuggle hops, this easy-drinking bitter features gentle malt flavours and a medium bitter finish. Ideal for summer.
products.name: Slightly Beer Fuggled

products.notes: Thanks to Hellertau hops, this straw-coloured, slightly cloudy wheat beer offers fruity aromas. It has classic wheat and fruit flavours,with a gentle bitter finish. Great cold on a hot summer day.
products.name: Stefans' Mühle

products.notes: A session beer featuring delicate Citra and Vic Secret hops, with crisp citrus and pineapple notes
products.name: Luminescent Pale Ale

products.notes: Light copper in colour, this pale ale features citrus and resinous pine flavours.
products.name: 3 Minute Voicemail

products.notes: A hazy golden beer with flavours of citrus and tropical fruits
products.name: Delicate Eco System

products.notes: This New England IPA features Cascade, Eldorado and Sabro hops.
products.name: A Long Way From the Corn Exchange

products.notes: Expect fruity flavours, particularly mango, lemon, lime and lychee from this bitter brewed using a rich grain bill balanced by hops..
products.name: Roman Mosaic

products.notes: A smoked porter with black pepper flavours, this is a one-off stronger version of our multi-award-winning smoked porte.
products.name: Dead Man's 7

products.notes: A punchy, fragrant American pale with Columbus hops that complement the smooth malt bill.
products.name: Kandata

products.notes: Described as golden yellow nectar, this beer blends pale barley, crystal malt and oats for a full flavour, ending with a gentle hoppy finish.
products.name: Goats Milk

products.notes: Honey beer
products.name: Pooh Beer

products.notes: Imagine all your favourite chocolate desserts crammed into a single glass. We've doubled up our usual additions of cacao and vanilla to create a hedonistic rush of flavours, blending gooey, dark chocolate brownies, silky ganache and smooth, cocoa-dusted truffles. The kind of elegant treat you'll delight in sharing with friends and loved ones at the end of a relaxing meal.
products.name: My Continuous Improvement: The Original

products.notes: The beer is a blend of chuckleberry foudre ale and a chuckleberry wild ale with beer to fruit ratio of 1:1. Super fruity and has some complex fermentation character from the foudre.
products.name: On The Shores of Infinity

products.notes: Featuring raspberries and apricot, this blend of one-, two and three-year-old golden ales is spontaneously fermented and aged in neutral French oak barrels, then refermented on Driscoll's Maravilla raspberries from Northamptonshire.
products.name: Red Hearth

products.notes: Pale, refreshing and extravagantly hoppy beer with gorgeous aromas of tropical fruits. Brewed with 100% extra-pale English barley malt and flavoured with heaps of choicest Brewers Gold hops, sourced with care from small-scale growers in the Hallertau.
products.name: Brewers Gold

products.notes: Full-bodied, traditional style mid-brown best brewed from 100% English barley malt and copious English Challenger and Boadicea hops.
products.name: Essex Boys Best Bitter

products.notes: A Kveik IPA with flavours of mango, guava and pineapple.
products.name: Bouba

products.notes: Brewed with lager yeast, but fermented at ale fermentation temperatures, this California Common beer is burnt gold in colour and bursting with fruity hoppy aromas, with hits of lychee, pine and orange. It's eminently drinkable with a subtle bitterness, medium body and a sweetness from the slightly higher finishing gravity. A foundation of Lager, Wheat, Vienna and Caramalt in the grist with Saaz, Hallertau Blanc and Citra hops in the Engine Room pulling the levers to create a distinctly smooth, hoppy beer.
products.name: Helihopter

products.notes: A tropical and citrus kick brewed with Magnum hops.
products.name: Never Say Die

products.notes: A modern take on an American IPA, this light golden ale has a good mouthfeel, a great flavour profile of malt and hops, and a dry finish.
products.name: Goose Ely

products.notes: This refreshing beer features fruity flavours and aromas and a moderate bitter finish.
products.name: Main Street Citra

products.notes: A complex stout with a slight orange nose and a hint of coffee and chocolate on the palate.
products.name: Silver Shadow Stout

products.notes: Light and well-balanced English pale ale with Challenger, Boadicea and Golding hops.
products.name: Uncle Percy's Solar-Powered Pale Ale

products.notes: Expect vibrant citrus, tropical fruits and floral aromas from this fusion of Southern hemisphere, Ella and Motueka hops. This complex cask ale has notes of lime, pineapple and nectarine with subtle spice undertones.
products.name: G'Day

products.notes: A deliciously juicy IPA, Turtles has a soft bitterness and a wonderfully tropical taste. Made with great balance for year-round easy refreshment, it features pronounced hops and a rounded body with soft bitterness.
products.name: Turtles All The Way Down

products.notes: A golden beer using English hops throughout, in particular Bramling Cross, Jamboree blends lager, pale and wheat malt for a smooth but refreshing mouthfeel.
products.name: Jamboree

products.notes: A collaboration with London Beer Co, this stout features toasted coconut.
products.name: Talk to the Palm Imperial Stout

products.notes: In this dryish, complex dark mild, caramel combines malt, roast and dark berry fruit flavours, plus a hint of sweetness.
products.name: Black Dog

products.notes: New World style, hoppy pale ale.
products.name: New World Session

products.notes: Dark, roast flavours of coffee and chocolate.
products.name: North Brink Porter

products.notes: A strong-bodied stout, with rich coffee and classic hop aromas, dark ripe fruit flavours and a velvet smoothness
products.name: Dark Horse Stout

products.notes: This traditional pale ale is initially malty and delicately bittered, leading on to a long, dry biscuit finish, enhanced by subtle citrus aromas.
products.name: Golden Pale Ale

products.notes: Made using ginger root extract for a refreshing flavour that is not overpowering.
products.name: Ginger

products.notes: This dark, traditional style porter offers a complex mix of roast malt and fruit flavours, with a degree of sweetness giving way to a dry finish.
products.name: Old Porter

products.notes: Light gold in colour with a malt and honey nose, this ale's smooth malt flavours lead to a clean, balanced malt and hop finish.
products.name: 3 Faze

products.notes: Base flavours of dark malts, chocolate, vanilla, prunes and fortified wine. Rich and full-bodied with hints of coffee, this stout is cask aged for a minimum of six months.
products.name: P2 Imperial Stout

products.notes: Expect tropical and citrus flavour from the Mosaic and Citra hops in this session IPA. It's brewed with pale barley, caramalt and oats for a smooth and silky mouthfeel.
products.name: Mad Jack Ha

products.notes: This Irish red ale has plum pudding and malted-milk biscuit aromas, fruity flavours and honey top notes, giving way to a warm, spiced finish. It's a full-flavoured ale, deep red in colour.
products.name: Red Rowan

products.notes: A full-on citrus experience. Light and golden, a perfect ale for whiling away the hours on a sunny day.
products.name: Jarl

products.notes: Session IPA dry hopped with Wai-iti, Talus and Strata, delivering fresh grapefruit, peach and apricot, with a touch of earthy funk.
products.name: Shapes In The Clouds

products.notes: A rare variant on Jarl, this is a much stronger version of our flagship Citra blonde, with bold fruit and whisky notes.
products.name: Whisky BA Jarl

products.notes: Richly golden in colour, with juicy flavours of grapefruit, papaya and pine resin, thanks to the abundant Simcoe, Centennial, Mosaic and Cascade hops.
products.name: Free Thinker

products.notes: Hoppy wheat beer with Vic Secret, Amarillo and Citra.
products.name: Secret Weisse

products.notes: Go back to the future with this black-coloured stout based on a 1790 Whitbread recipe. Its roast aroma dominates from the start to the long-lingering finish, with a bittersweet chocolate note adding depth.
products.name: Blackwood Stout

products.notes: Light on the palate and bursting with juicy, tropical fruit hop flavours.
products.name: Lignum Vitae

products.notes: Hazy juicy IPA, with punchy orange flavours.
products.name: Okapi

products.notes: Stronger than usual, this cask-conditioned mild features rich flavours and Bobek hops.
products.name: Strong Mild

products.notes: Gold in colour, with floral, citrus aromas and hints of pear and peach
products.name: Wyvern APA

products.notes: A nod to our local brewing heritage, this mild has a deep malt flavour, with notes of caramel and chocolate.
products.name: Bostin' Mild

products.notes: Oats, oats and more oats! A soft, smooth and luscious mouthfeel with notes of rich chocolate and roast.
products.name: Murder She Oat

products.notes: A bright golden colour, this wheat beer has restrained zesty citrus flavour from the hops and orange peels, balanced wtih soft sweetness from the wheat malt.
products.name: Orange Wheat Beer

products.notes: A rich fruity red ale brewed with oak and beech smoked malt for a subtle smokey flavour and a dry smokey finish.
products.name: Red Herring

products.notes: Full-bodied, copper-coloured premium bitter brewed with English whole cone hops. Rich and malty with fruity hop flavours.
products.name: Trawlerboys

products.notes: A modern golden coloured lager brewed to mimic beers at Germany's Munich Oktoberfest. It features plenty of German malt, balanced with real German hops for a clean taste and a touch of bitterness.
products.name: 601 Club

products.notes: A fruit bomb of a hazy American Pale Ale, thanks to lashings of hops so expect an amazing aroma and tropical taste. Plenty of malt gives depth, compensating for the hop overload.
products.name: She Keeps It Nice

products.notes: A complex mix of roasted and chocolate malts, plus Brazilian coffee beans and Brazil nuts gives this porter a wonderfully rich character.
products.name: What Do You Recommend

products.notes: Fresh British rhubarb macerated for three months with fresh saison for a dry, acidic flavour.
products.name: Bière de Saison - Rhubarb

products.notes: Expect richness and softness in perfect harmony, with hints of chocolate, woodsmoke and well-aged brandy in this rare and complex double mashed imperial stout.
products.name: Murder of Crows

products.notes: Full-bodied dark roasted backbone. Subtle blueberry and raisin notes with a gentle gathering bitterness.
products.name: Powder Blue Blueberry Porter

products.notes: Hints of melon and strawberry flavour this well-balanced, crisp and floral spring ale, brewed with local raw wildflower honey from Lacons hives and Huell melon hops. A pale straw colour, it has a silk mouthfeel.
products.name: Bloom

products.notes: A warming mild-bodied ale with a slightly nutty flavour and rich taste thanks to being aged for more than three months.
products.name: Old Nogg

products.notes: A rich mahogany-coloured mild with notes of hedgerow berries, smooth caramel and lightly roasted malt.
products.name: Dark Mild

products.notes: A refreshing pale ale with a lean and crisp base featuring tonnes of Simcoe, plus T90, Cyro and Incognito hops. It's our second special cask release of 2024.
products.name: Simcoe Pale

products.notes: Made with top quality traditional ingredients, delivering a strong beer with complex flavours of toffee and vinous fruits.
products.name: Barley Wine 2023

products.notes: Slightly hazy and with a bitter finish, this classic IPA leans towards a West Coast style. Brewed with Amarillo, Centennial, Mosaic and Simcoe hops.
products.name: Boatyard IPA

products.notes: Our refreshing golden ale, brewed with a variety of English and American hops.
products.name: Kursaal Gold

products.notes: Juicy and hoppy, this American style IPA was Champion Beer of Nottingham 2020.
products.name: 200 Not Out

products.notes: Citra oatmeal pale.
products.name: Breakfast in America

products.notes: This premium pale ale is rammed with Citra, Mosaic and Simcoe hops giving a refreshing beer with a smooth clean finish.
products.name: Epiphany

products.notes: A wonderfully balanced hazy session pale ale, with floral and citrus notes.
products.name: Hush

products.notes: Special for the 2024 festival
products.name: 50 Festivals Later

products.notes: Tropical fruit pulp IPA
products.name: Kaiju

products.notes: Refreshing lemongrass pale with a peppery bitterness.
products.name: Spiffing Wheeze

products.notes: Full-bodied, rounded malty and biscuit tastes, this beautiful deep red-brown beer is moderately hopped and slightly dry.
products.name: Brown Owl

products.notes: Surprisingly refreshing, this beer is brewed from an 1850 Whitbread recipe using pale, brown, chocolate and black malts and lots of Fuggles and East Kent Goldings hops.
products.name: V&A Porter

products.notes: With a subtle grapefruit aroma, this traditional IPA style beer has a long bittersweet finish, with a robust character and a bitterness balanced with an intense floral hop flavour.
products.name: Cascade IPA

products.notes: Roasty dark mild with suggestions of forest fruits and dark chocolate. A sweet taste yields to a more bitter finish.
products.name: Oscar Wilde

products.notes: This cask conditioned German-style Pilsner, has a clean, smooth, fresh flavour and is brewed with pilsner malt and Tettnang and Hallertau hops.
products.name: Fenland Pilsner

products.notes: A well-balanced bitter with plenty of red fruit flavours.
products.name: Rolling Mile

products.notes: Refreshing New World IPA with citrus and gooseberry flavours. Nelson Sauvin hops.
products.name: Fletchers Ale

products.notes: Black rich smooth creamy porter with a subtle hint of honey.
products.name: Honey Porter

products.notes: Orange and caramel on the nose, rich sweet marmalade notes lead to a pleasant bitter finish
products.name: Beerset

products.notes: Special for 25 years of Milton Brewery. Rich, sweet and full with a burst of boozy bitter orange.
products.name: Demisemicentenary

products.notes: Special for the 2024 festival. Light citrus with a pleasing bitter finish.
products.name: Kvindekjariĝo

products.notes: Rich, dark mild with bags of character from the lavish use of chocolate malt.
products.name: Minotaur

products.notes: A satisfying, full-flavoured black brew with a good balance of malt, roast and fruit. Bittersweet flavours carry through to a dry finish.
products.name: Nero

products.notes: Blonde IPA, fruity bitterness and crisp, dry finish. Champion Cask Beer of Norfolk 2023
products.name: Cheeky Jack

products.notes: Light, fruity and packed full of complex flavours
products.name: Ostara

products.notes: Fruity and refreshing, subtle blueberries and a bright finish. Ideal for a summer's day.
products.name: Blueberry Ale

products.notes: Sweet with rich malty flavours thanks to dark roasted malts blended with oats and wheat for a mellow, silky smooth and juicy rich stout.
products.name: Cellarman's Stout

products.notes: Special for the 2024 festival. Light in body, smooth with   a lingering melon finish.
products.name: How It Ends

products.notes: Reddish beer made from East Anglian malts and the finest Kent hops
products.name: In The Beginning

products.notes: A flavourful meld of roasted notes with hints of nuts, chocolate and caramel.
products.name: Fusioneer

products.notes: Peach tea infused pale ale
products.name: Peach Tea Pale

products.notes: This unexpected blend of South American coffee, Madagascan vanilla and lactose sugar makes for a smooth, sweet milkt stout.
products.name: Vanilla Latte

products.notes: Pale session beer
products.name: Big Bertha

products.notes: Multi award-winning strong full bodied mild
products.name: Magnum Mild

products.notes: Hazy pale, light in body with distinct peach, mango, pineapple and citrus notes.
products.name: 4 Man Bob

products.notes: Hazy pale with intense peach, mango, pineapple and fresh citrus flavours brewed with London Fog yeast and Nelson Sauvin, Nectaron and Waimea hops.
products.name: Business Time

products.notes: An uber-refreshing, deep golden ale with an intriguing union of lemon and ginger.
products.name: Lemon Head

products.notes: Spicy coriander, roast malt and fruit flavours give way to a powerfully hoppy finish in this complex, smooth, distinctive Old Growler porter
products.name: Umbel Magna

products.notes: Dark malts and fruit.
products.name: Black Squall

products.notes: Expect toffee and fruit flavours in this reddish beer with a bitter after taste.
products.name: Decommissioned

products.notes: A smooth and sumptous stout brewed with eight different malts and a liberal dash of moreish Oakham hoppiness from plenty of Centennial and Oticana hops
products.name: Bite The Bullet

products.notes: Unfined and hazy, exploding with citrus and tropical hop flavours
products.name: Citra Haze

products.notes: A speciality beer with fruit and hops aroma and flavours, leading to a strong, dry and moderately astringent finish.
products.name: White Dwarf

products.notes: An extremely quaffable black ale with pear drop and apples on the nose with a rich and smooth body.
products.name: Black Pig

products.notes: Well-balanced strong ale with complex hop, fruit, sweet and bitter flavours and a lingering pleasant aftertaste.
products.name: Gunner's Daughter

products.notes: Oak-aged and blended with madeira.
products.name: Good King Henry V

products.notes: Dark and rich with a pleasant chocolate character, dangerously quaffable.
products.name: Bière Noire

products.notes: This beer's reddish hue and a full-bodied aroma are thanks to Munich and cara malts, balanced with continental Perle hops. Fermented with Bavarian lager yeast.
products.name: Red Oktober

products.notes: Fruity, piney, intense. Light copper with approachable bitterness and a dry finish.
products.name: Cliff Edge

products.notes: Fruity, honey, irresistible. Deep gold, slightly dry and delightfully sessionable.
products.name: Corncrake

products.notes: Imperial strength Dark Island. After a long and slow fermentation at our brewery in Quoyloo, the beer is finished in old oak casks, formerly used to mature fine scotch malt whisky
products.name: Dark Island Reserve

products.notes: Pale in colour, this traditional, easy drinking Yorkshire Bitter, made from all British ingredients, has a floral, spicy hoppy aroma. Sweet malt and honey flavours on the palate are followed by a moderately bitter finish.
products.name: Butterley

products.notes: Hazy cask Kellerbier.
products.name: Force of Nature

products.notes: A lager style beer with a crisp, dry flavour and citrus fruity aroma.
products.name: Silver King

products.notes: From our single hop series, Emperor has flavours of bitter orange with a touch of spice.
products.name: Single Hop - Emperor

products.notes: A deliciously rich and full-bodied stout, it's smooth, with moderate bitterness. Chocolate flavours dominate the palate, paired wtih aromas of orange and vanilla, brewed from pale, roasted and chocolate malts.
products.name: Voodoo

products.notes: This very pale, hoppy ale is made from low-colour malt and the combination of Cascade, Columbus and Amarillo hops produce an intensely aromatic and resinous finish.
products.name: White Rat

products.notes: Refreshing amber table beer, grape-like fruitiness with a light bitter finish.
products.name: Cub

products.notes: Refreshingly clean ginger wheat beer with a distinct fiery kick.
products.name: Ginger Panther

products.notes: A deliciously hoppy wheat beer with a crisp light body, finishing with hints of bananas and tropical fruits.
products.name: Koura

products.notes: A very dark and full-bodied ale with a strong hop aroma. Dark fruit flavours soften the heavy and complex malts and a mischievously smooth yet hoppy finish belies its strength.
products.name: Robin Goodfellow

products.notes: A French daiquiri-inspired sour beer made with pineapples, raspberries, blackberries and lime juice.
products.name: C'est Pastoré

products.notes: Ripple ice cream pastry sour with cherry, amaretto, honeycomb and vanilla.
products.name: Cherry Amaretti Ripple

products.notes: A fruit crumble pastry sour with apple, plum, maple syrup and vanilla.
products.name: Double Crumble

products.notes: A tropical soda inspired sour beer with mango, passion fruit, guava, orange and apricot.
products.name: Rio de Pastore

products.notes: Spritzy, low alcohol lemon and lime sour beer.
products.name: Spritz

products.notes: An unfined zingy, dry and refreshing Berliner Weisse style sour beer with fruit.
products.name: Waterbeach Weisse

products.notes: Another classic Phipps ale from the 1950s, this blended ale was always the perfect marriage of Ratliffe's Stout and IPA with a dash of Gold Star. The hoppiness of Phipps signature ales cuts through the smooth body of a creamy stout.
products.name: Bison Brown

products.notes: A tasty bitter designed to cut through the leather dust of Northamptonshire's shoe factory workers. Its balanced flavour and refreshing, moreish bitterness will wash away the toil of any day.
products.name: Cobblers Ale

products.notes: A deep, dry, rich black beer, with touches of liquorice and cocoa, hints of tar and roast grain
products.name: Black Poppy

products.notes: Big hoppy IPA style beer, packed full of Kiwi hops with hints of honey and nectar and plenty of tropical citrus and floral notes.
products.name: Big Chief

products.notes: This Vietnamese Coffee Stout has an assertive roasty bitterness, which gives way to a smooth, rich, dark chocolate and hazelnut finish. Dangerously drinkable
products.name: Breakfast Stout

products.notes: Aromas of mango, grapefruit and papaya give way to a clean bitter finish Maris Otter and cara malt, with Amarillo, Citra and Simcoe hops.
products.name: Wreckless

products.notes: Expect juicy, tropical and stone fruit flavours, with sticky pine and notes of earthy black tea. Reformulated to use American Idaho 7 hops
products.name: Lunar Module

products.notes: A herbal, floral aroma and flavour thanks to English Harlequin hops
products.name: Rapier

products.notes: A crisp, refreshing cask-conditioned lager, with floral and sweet honey notes, thanks to Aramis and Ultra hops. Brewed with flaked maize and fine pilsner malts.
products.name: Saffron Sun

products.notes: Our blood red saison sour is brewed with pilsner malt, Czech hops and double fermented with fresh cherry juice. We use Belgian saison yeast and wild yeast strains to deliver a refreshing bite with tart, mouthwatering flavours.
products.name: Vampire

products.notes: Cashmere and Mosaic hops complement each other in this hazy tropical pale.
products.name: Clever Hawks Hide Claws

products.notes: Amarillo hopped fruity golden ale.
products.name: Hunky Dory

products.notes: A fine example of a traditional and malty best bitter.
products.name: The Cure

products.notes: Expect punchy hop aromas and a satisfyingly delicious depth of flavour from this soft pale ale. It's the culmination of much work, experimentation and research into brewing beers at this strength.
products.name: Mesmerist

products.notes: Using Strata hops was just too good an opportunity to miss. We think this soft, hazy beer is the perfect way to show off its layered tropical fruit notes, with hints of bright berries and juicy melon.
products.name: Suspended in Strata

producers.notes: St. Peter South Elmham, Suffolk est. 1996

products.notes: A rich black velvet colour, coffee and vanilla notes on the nose with a rich creamy chocolate flavour and smooth mouth feel together with a satisfying bittersweet aftertaste. This strong, dark and aromatic cream stout is made from a blend of five local malts with Fuggle, Progress and Challenger hops.
products.name: Cream Stout

products.notes: A light and refreshing golden ale with pleasing citrus aromas and a gentle balanced malt finish.
products.name: Gold Dust

producers.name: St. Peter's

products.notes: Pale gold in colour with flavours of soft orangey bubblegum, a hint of tropical hops, light grain, honey and a crack of black pepper.
products.name: Petite Saison

products.notes: Our signature beer, this tripel has a sweetness on the nose, perfectly balanced with refreshing hints of orange peel and gentle notes of coriander on your palate. It's full-bodied and is our strongest beer.
products.name: Tripel

products.notes: A fusion of coriander, orange peel and the natural sourness of the wheat make this a light, refreshing and crisp beer with a slightly sour finish.
products.name: Wheat

products.notes: Creamy mouthfeel and mellow bitterness - a juicy and hazy all day extra pale ale. All NZ hops - Rakau, Wai-iti, Kohatu and Taiheke bring heaps of Apricot, Peach, Grapefruit and lime.
products.name: NZ Pale

products.notes: An 8 malt monster with Carared, Red X and Spelt bringing toffee, caramel and biscuit sweetness.  Centennial on the hot side and Mosaic on the cold side accentuate the malt notes with a controlled piney and floral bitterness. Summer time cask beer.
products.name: Red Ale

products.notes: Our low ABV table ale - big mouthfeel and flavour for such a small beer. An addition of cucumber on the hot side brings a fresh spring flavour with Strata and Motueka adding lemon, lime zest with spice and floral notes. Clean, crisp, refreshing and low abv!
products.name: Table Beer

products.notes: A New England pale delivering lots of citrus, tangerine and coconut.
products.name: Citra & Sabro

products.notes: Chocolate and coconut stout.
products.name: Coconut Blues

products.notes: The latest version of our session IPAs, hopped with Columbus, Mosaic and Citra. Unfined.
products.name: Juice Rocket

products.notes: Session pale ale with plenty of hop flavour.
products.name: Lonely Snake

products.notes: Well-rounded, crisp, New Zealand style pilsner.
products.name: Low Down Pilsner

products.notes: Blackcurrant and raspberry sour.
products.name: Pucker Up

products.notes: Triple-hopped pale with Sabro, Citra and El Dorado.
products.name: Sabitora

products.notes: A fruity little pale ale, it's super pale, super bright and super tasty, with Amarillo, Cascade, Centennial and Citra hops.
products.name: Zephyr

products.notes: Refreshing pale session bitter, with a zesty bitterness and a lingering citrus finish.
products.name: Barn Ale

products.notes: Golden premium bitter, full of red fruit/candy citrus and tropical fruit flavours thanks to Superdelic hops from New Zealand.
products.name: Superdelic

products.notes: Our flagship hazy pale in cask with limited availbility. Huge citrus punch, tangerine and grapefruit from ample Amarillo and Simcoe.
products.name: Joosy
